ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: This work was funded by the cooperative agreement #NU2GGH001873 to Training Programs in Epidemiology and Public Health Interventions Network (TEPHINET) and the cooperative agreement #NU2G GH001800 to Metabiota, Inc The authors would like to recognize the support and contributions from Mr Mba Bekolo and Ms Cecilia Fonda from Metabiota; Mr Alexis Boupda Kuate from the Care and Health Program (CHP); as well as Mr Gordon Okpu and Ms Brandy Airall‚ÄêPerry from the CDC Cameroon Office.
